title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero
notes: Crashed on welcome screen at first.  On play the second time I selected the '64-bit DX11' and now runs fine with minor graphical errors when moving

title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero
notes: Have to start at least once in windowed mode (Alt-Return), otherwise it will only run with <1 FPS. 64-bit version does not start at all.

title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero
notes: The game is pixelated in the intro, and too slow in the menu and game

title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero
notes: 64-bit option crashes in proton. Launching the game normally, there's noticeable screen tearing, and the game doesn't have a v-sync option. I never saw screen tearing when playing the 64-bit option in Wine, though, nor did I see tearing when I last played it on Windows.

title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero
notes: Some screen tearing on Ubuntu (Gnome), no screen tearing on Solus (Budgie).

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 630 (Kaby Lake GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: didnt have an FPS counter but pretty safe to say it ran at about 0.5 FPS. However music and sound seemed to run just fine.
title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 630 (Kaby Lake GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: I had to install Bumblebee drivers "https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Bumblebee#Installation". Had to play without the 64 bit version
title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 630 (Kaby Lake GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: had to turn off Intel drivers in "drivers manager" and made sure Nvidia drivers were active and restarted. Worked perfectly
title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero

notes: Played default version for an hour -- no problems at all.   Cannot run the 64bit/DX11 version due to graphics card error/warning.

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon HD 7900 Series (TAHITI, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.9-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 6.0.1)

title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.9-desktop-2.mga7, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: If the game runs at 1fps at launch, the solution is to fight through it until you get to the settings menu, from there change the resolution to anything other than 1080p. Once the game restarts the fps issue will be gone, and you can put the resolution back up to whatever resolution you want it to be. You won't have to do this again after doing this once. Also the dx11 version doesn't launch.
title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero
